original_text: For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last, as it were appointed to death: for we are made a spectacle unto the world, and to angels, and to men.
korean_text: 내가 생각하건대 하나님이 사도인 우리를 죽이기로 작정된 자 같이 끄트머리에 두셨으매 우리는 세계 곧 천사와 사람에게 구경거리가 되었노라

sentences.original_text: For I think that God hath set forth us the apostles last
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 생각하건대 하나님께서 우리 사도들을 마지막으로 세우셨으니

sentences.original_text: as it were appointed to death
for we are made a spectacle unto the world
